item.title: Bicep: Create empty Managed Disk
item.description: resource disk ‘Microsoft.Compute/disks@2023-01-02’ = { name: diskName location: resourceGroup().location sku: { name: diskSku } properties: { creationData: { createOption: ‘Empty’ } diskSizeGB: diskSizeGb } tags: { environment: ‘demo’ } } output diskId string = disk.id " role=“button” style=“color:#D4D4D4;display:none” tabindex=“0”>``` param diskName string = ‘testdisk’ param diskSizeGb int = 128 param diskSku string = ‘Premium_LRS’ resource disk ‘Microsoft.Compute/disks@2023-01-02’ = { name: diskName location: resourceGroup().location sku: { name: diskSku } properties: { creationData: { createOption: ‘Empty’ } diskSizeGB: diskSizeGb } tags: { environment: ‘demo’ } } output diskId string = disk.
